title: Where is my chat restriction? And help me!
body:
I've been so toxic in chat for the last few weeks, and I'm not getting chat restricted or anything.

Also, someone teach how to be more zen. I feel like such a piece of shit after a game. I mistreat people something fierce and I definitely am a kill-joy.

Someone teach me how to be more zen!

replies.body: No chat restriction because being toxic and getting punished are not one in the same.

Expect to have a bad experience. That way when this happens it won't be so aggravating. You can just think well that's what i expected and move on, also inversely if a game goes well it will seem that much better. I also try to think in any given situation what could i have done better and not what they could be doing.

Also imagine someone that you like is playing the champ that is feeding or whatever. Would you abuse you dear old grandma for having a bad game....maybe but probably not.
Instead of pushing enter after  you've typed at that feeding mid, push escape instead. Then sing a verse of tubthumping
